title: Emerald Blossom Diamond Jhumka - "Pachala Ravva Gummadi Jhumka"
materials: Cultured Pearls. Features a Hyderabadi polish for enhanced luster and durability.
features: Classic bell-shaped Jhumka design, featuring intricate diamond-studded lattice work. The floral motif at the top highlights a stunning pear-shaped Emerald, followed by another floral arrangement. Delicate pearl drops (Muthyala Gutta) adorn the base, adding a touch of elegance and movement. The overall design blends traditional Telugu aesthetics with modern diamond setting techniques.
colors: with a vibrant pop of green from the emerald and a soft luster from the pearls.
occasions: and other special occasions. Ideal for Seemantham
and other family gatherings where traditional attire is favored.
description: Exquisite craftsmanship by skilled artisans in Hyderabad. The vibrant emerald and sparkling diamonds create a captivating visual appeal. Symbolizes prosperity and good fortune, making it a cherished heirloom piece. Durable and long-lasting due to the high-quality materials and meticulous workmanship. A beautiful blend of traditional design and contemporary elegance.
